name: One Million Kisses
description:
"safeness"

The legend says that here was a time when five sisters, the Seasons, ruled over the weather from their mountain. Their names were Spring, Rain, Summer, Autumn, and Winter.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2008-10-11. It was made by mikey. HTML version done by Alte. Estimated completion time is 5 minutes.

One Million Kisses is game Nr. 15 of the Original 22.
